content.detailedDescription:
I have always been different.  many say i am an indigo.  i am not sure i was abducted, i don't have lucid memory of any abduction.  here is what happened:

several nights in a row within one week in january 2011 i had the feeling of someone grabbing my ankles in bed.  some of the times when i was clearly awake.  one night when this happened i looked out my large bedroom wall window to see about 5 fast flashes of light and then i experienced a loud multi-tonal ring in my ears for about 30 seconds.  

i have seen what i thought was craft 3 times in my life.  in childhood there was a time i went for a walk in the woods with a friend (we were 12) and were scared and ran back home to be reprimanded for being gone so long.  we thought we were away from home only a short period of time.

i am curious to hear your input.  since the last experience happened this month i have had a heightened sixth sense (more than normal), and a sudden obsession with ets.  when i see certain photos of aliens i feel unexplainable deep compassion mixed with some fear.  there are also 2 windows in my home that i won't walk by at night by myself, just those 2, i am afraid of, no others.  also, suddenly, i feel like i am part of something large going on.  i feel a strong sense of duty.  

if so inclined, your input would be appreciated.
content.summary: Several times in one week i felt my ankles grabbed in bed, one night saw a flash and heard multi-toned ringing in my ears.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been having multiple sighting for a few years now i dont know what they mean either. 

in may 2008 i was on vacation in florida on the gulf coast,  i love to go for walks on the beach at nights.  one night i was sitting on the beach it was a wierd night no lights were on in the houses so the sky was clear, as i sat on the beach there was no clouds in the sky. a few minutes passed when i heard a strange humming sound, i thought nothing of it, then i see a really random cloud flying really low towards the beach i kept looking at it because the humming was getting louder and this cloud was really big, then it stopped but the wind was really blowing steadly. as i stood there i then see a light shoot down from the cloud into the water so bright you could see to the bottom, it made a sound like someone turned on a light switch too.  then i started getting nervous so i backed up but i was strangle courous so i stayed and watched it hover to the dunes where it went down near some trees and then a spiral of lights appeared for a brief few seconds.

that following sunday i was back home, my wife and i decided to go for a walk as we were walking down the street i felt the need to look up and on the right of me was three objects in the air hovering, they looked like oddly shapped orbs alot like the movie flight of the navigator ship.  i also noticed there was no air traffic in a heavy traveling area.  i stood there staring when one just vanished, the other one turned around and poined its nose downward and flew off really fast, the other went another direction,  a few minutes later air traffic started again.  

another one was in 2010 when i was driving to work i noticed something shinny in the air near the toll roads, and there was another object just hoving there and then dissapeared.

the most recient one was on halloween of 2010, i was having a very small get together we were all on the pourch when my wife asked me to put the strob light near the tree, as i walked onto the lawn i looked up and saw a triangle shapped object flying very low heading perfectly south, i noticed it because it had an orange light on in the center, i felt good because i got my wife and her two friends to witness this too.  im not sure why i am seeing all these things but i would like some answers, these are all real sighting.  thanks
content.summary: Hidden

content.detailedDescription:
1-30-11
7:48 pm
garner, nc
quick video of triangle object..

all,
this appeared very quickly and i only have around 2/5 seconds of it, please pause it and slow it down and look at the object. you make the decision on what it is. i apologize for not a cleaner picture/video. it was flying real fast and it was straight above my home and could not get a good shot of it.

stop it at 7 thru 10 to really look at the ship.
content.summary: Triangle object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my boyfriend around 11 in the morning on thursday january 28th 2011. he noticed an airplane very high in the sky and he said "that airplane is really high!" i looked up to see the airplane and i did see it. but then i looked up again and there i saw two twin oval shaped objects in the sky even farther up then the plane was, they were moving next to each other at the same speed. at first i thought it was just my imagination then i slowed the car down and looked again for a longer time. as i was looking i said to my boyfriend "what is that?" and then the objects began weaving in and out of each other slow at first.  i then stopped the car completely in the middle of the street and stared at them and they began going faster weaving in and out of each other. then i noticed i was stopped in the middle of the street and there were other cars coming so i had to drive. i then looked back up again and they were gone. i was a little freaked out but i was also so excited because i had never seen anything like it before and new there was no explanation for that.
content.summary: Two glowing oval shaped objects in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside my house, on to my back porch to have a cigarette, it had been raining and was very overcast. i thought the ground was strangely illuminated for it being so overcast, so i went out from under the coverage of my screened in porch, and looked up. i saw what seemed to be a low flying object, i thought it was a plane at first, but it was way too big and moving much too strangely. it was triangular in shape, with 7 lights 6 of them were along the edges of the bottom surface of the object and were a moderately bright yellow, the seventh seemed to be in the center and much larger than the others, but dim in comparison. the rest of the craft was black against the overcast sky.

the object was rotating clockwise, at about 2-3 rotations per minute if i had to guess, and seemed like it was drifting in a southernly direction. it drifted for what seemed like a very long time, but it was only about 5-7 minutes, then it instantaneously changed directions and moved west at a highly accelerated rate of speed. it left my field of vision, i went inside and grabbed a bottle of whiskey. i am now coming to terms with this, i have never really thought much about ufo's or paranormal stuff, but i started looking stuff up and read something about mufon so i found the site and here i am.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle with 7 lights

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving from vassar to saginaw at seven pm et when i looked up at sky  and a blue and red light in the sky did not think much of it as i kept going it loked like it was pacing me i turned from the south to the west to  i loked again the object was behind me i looked 20 seconds later the object was ahead of me  i drove to my house looked out my window the object in the south west corner of the sky a small airport is due north of me i have seen helicopters and planes land there iwatch this object stay in that position for a hour a liitle worried now  after a hour it  moves form ten oclock to twelve o clock position i say if it is a helicopter why is it there why hover for a hour in wrong place i look ten minutes later it is gone wierd.
content.summary: Saw strange light in sky over a hour moved position then gone

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside playing with my toddler son at when i saw approximately 6-10 spheres flying in what looked like a formation floating from north to south.  at first, i thought that they were just released helium balloons.  on further observation, however, they seemed too big and their placement in relation to each other did not seem random enough.  they moved very slowly and at a certain point (probably around 8 minutes into the episode) one of the spheres on the flank appeared to circle another that was adjacent to it.  after this, they started to slowly disappear except for one which got brighter and started to reverse its path from heading south back to heading north.  it appeared to be rising and it too faded from sight.

i live in white settlement, tx, just about 2 miles from a naval reserve/texas air national guard base (fort worth nas/jrb).  no aircraft were ever scrambled.  it was 5:30 in the afternoon, clear sky, still daylight.  the spheres did float like balloons and they did move in the direction of the wind......But their behavior just seemed odd.
content.summary: Formation of white spheres

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work taking a moment to make tea, as i had just started for the morning. i saw a colleague in the lunch room and chatted to her as i made my tea, but was drawn to a brilliant ball of light outside the window.
i had to have a closer look and went right up to the window to see if it was a reflection. it was a very hot day and the sun was bright so i thought this the most likely explanation.
however, i could not tell for certain that the light was on a building in the distance or on a hill, as i tried to move perspective and i couldn't say for sure that it was 'attached' to anything.
i asked my colleague her opinion and she was a little taken aback but was sure that it must have been reflecting off something.
i took a photo with my phone, so it is a terrible quality but allowed me to get a reference shot.
i went back to work, planning to check on it in a little bit to see if i could get a clearer impression.
probably not even half an hour later, another friend invited me to take a break as he was going out for a cigarette and i told him about it. from the ground outside (the office is on the 16th floor) it was impossible to see anything. after we went back up i went straight to the lunch room to see if the view was any clearer. i lined my view up with the picture i had taken and couldn't even see a tiny reflection. i had wondered if maybe the sun had moved dramatically and so the 'reflection' was gone. however, i knew from being outside that the sun was pretty high overhead so i can't imagine it could've changed the sight so dramatically.
i've decided to wait another day and see if the spectacle repeats itself tomorrow morning. if so, then it is definitely some kind of 'trick reflection' - though i have been checking google maps all day to try and figure out what kind of building could be there to cause such an amazing sight. there is absolutely nothing in the air between the two points i used as reference (a building and a church spire). i've been reading too much of this stuff, so i'm busy convincing myself it was nothing.
however, i came onto this site and noticed that someone else in melbourne has seen the same thing a few days ago and so did someone in japan, by the sound of it, so i'm waiting to see what tomorrow brings, evidence-wise.
i can be contacted for further questions or whatever. i have a picture (low quality) which i will attach.
content.summary: Motionless star-like light in or near melbourne. tried to discern if it was some kind of reflection.

content.detailedDescription:
When i went melbourn with my wife and my daughter, we had a stop over at my brother in law's house to feed my 10 month old daughter. his house situate in david street (infront of the davis st berry st intersection).
when got down from the car i heard a helichopter sound, which sounds like moving very slow. before i enter inside the unit i looked at the ske in western direction towards the sound of the helichopter and found a very slow moving choper at very high altitude and also i saw a star like object (which was stationary) near by and which drew my attention as the time was mid noon and in a clear sky no one can see the star. i called my wife and pointed the direction but she couldn't be able to noticed it as she has bad vision. as we were in hurry to resume our journy to melbourne i went inside to feed my daughter. 10 min later i came out side to have a look and still the object was there but there were some black objects move close to the object, but i'm not sure about the black object  as it may be the due to sun light. but the other star like object was definitely an object. 15 min later when i checked the sky the object was dissappeared.
content.summary: Star like object  in the day light sky

content.detailedDescription: Object stood still had red and green lights flicking. triangle shaped.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object

content.detailedDescription: Has been showing up every night for 10 + days.From ground looks triangular with blue light coming off of it.But if you photograph it and zoom in ,it is a much different shape.Long horizontal cylinder with square on one end rounded on the other end. silver in color.It hovers in a floating circular motion.Moving up and down left to right.I have a really good photo of it.
content.summary: Cylinder with square shape on one end rounded on the other end

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking behind a strip mall(includes hobby lobby, subway, etc) in rockwall, tx. i'm nearly past the last bit of darkness behind those buildings, sorta caught up in my own thoughts at the time, but directly in my vision up above, light moving catches my attention. (and bear in mind that on this nite it is very clear weather)well, not even light, just movement in the sky above my head. there are no sounds other than the roar of the highway(interstate 30), but as i stopped, every sense in me turned to whatever the hell it was i was seeing. oddly enough i can't say they were airplanes as there was an airplane going directly above and forward of me, crossing perpendicular to the path of these things i was seeing... the most absolute definition of perfect spheres. absolutely perfect spheres. they were streaming past at no particular interval, and very low. much lower than the one airplane i could see above these spheres. and this is the only reason i decided to put this story somewhere, because they were so low that i could with just my eyes see them from underneath as they streamed past. a direct view. most all of them were just white spheres. but disturbingly there's definitely a "leader" amongst these things, cause when i fully stopped and my brain clicked that i wasn't seeing random stuff or airplanes, i saw one that appeared green-ish with two tinier(or super-faster)orbs zinging around, infront, behind, thru it. like "leader of the pack" style travel, all of these things. so not shooting stars, for sure. i watched these things come from behind me, directly overtop me, then infront of me, absorbing as much as i could in that time. i know after about 30 seconds this is the first time in my life i have seen something unexplained. the speed of these things weren't natural. the shape. and the other detail that also has me telling this tale, is that being they were so low, and one in particular that much lower, i can describe(as best i can) what it looked like. one i most remember, as it slowed down like it was looking at me(could be paranoia in my head at this point but whatever). this perfect sphere like all the others, was golden-yellowish....If ufos and all that are ships or craft...How the hell can i still see thru it? they are transparent, these things, when viewed closely. if i could draw this one here, i would. these are not spotlights. not craft, but yet fly about like they are. yet something is inside them. this one, i followed with my eyes and already i'm on my knees at this point, from behind me to infront....But looking directly at it...I get the feeling i am not seeing what is really there. these things make no sound in passing, just to add a note. i fully believe even if i was in a countryside away from human sounds, these things are silent as a grave. i've got enough of a military mind to recognize some details. these spheres didn't even disturb the air about them, yet are traveling around. i've been made aware of these sightings of such a specific formation. a news camera picked these things up in broad daylight. i never gave it a thought. but i have become more aware after that, of massive sightings of these things. so i put out there i have foreknowledge of them. i'm a drinker. i don't do drugs. i had 1/2 of a bud ice 40oz. when i went for a walk out to ez mart for tampons and i still stand by the fact i didn't imagine it. i do know i took time to decide to walk, as i dont like walking, it hurts my legs. but something put me out there at an intersection of time and events to see these damn things. and whoever reads this, that airplane that crossed at that same time at this location...There's no f'ing way that they didnt see what i did, being above the spheres flying across their path. if you were on that flight, speak out. if you were the pilot, speak out. there's no way a plane full of people didn't see what i saw, though strangely i was closer to them. i encourage anyone to speak of these spheres, cause even i have now seen them and they are showing up in day and nite, fully public view with many witnesses.
i am 29 years old. i have been a huge fan of the x-files, sci-fi stuff, a geek in general, even admired mufon due to the x-files show, cause i respect everything "outside the norm". one thing i never have done is say i've seen/experienced anything. infact the opposite. i always wanted to. now i am feeling i regret that, cause i am scared beyond belief. are these alien? or are they angels? demons? something metaphysical? i'm just plum scared after its happened, especially when i felt one slowed to "look" at me. and it's sad when i was on the ground looking up....A white expedition passed me by, never wondering what i was looking up at. or the other scattering of people i saw after i got off the ground to finish my walk to the store(in tears, freaked out)...No one even payed mind. these things are appearing for a reason, and in massive sightings. damn. i'm only on this site cause i watched a television show ffs. otherwise i feel very alone with what i saw and who to tell. if you are like me, never seen anything odd in your life in the sky but know full well you didn't hallucinate....Speak. whatever these particular spheres are about...We need the pros of this area to have knowledge of their whereabouts and hope they see a pattern we can't. i'll leave my story in the hands of mufon and whoever else they deem necessary.
content.summary: Long line of orbs flying really low over my head

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the tomei expressway. i just got off the expressway on exit #5 to atsugi/ebina. ebina is the newly built exit. i took the ebina exit. i was driving on the long straight away, when i noticed a bright starlike light in the sky. the sky was very dark. night time. a few other stars were visible. this light was brighter than them all. i guessed it was a helicopter because stars are not that bright. also, there is a navy aviation base close by. i used to work there, and i know they have helicopters. my wife was with me in the car. i told her to take a look at it and tell me what she think it is. she said "i dont know, it could be a star." i was coming close the the point where the straight away ends. about 5 seconds before i have to follow a curve on the road, the light disappears from the sky. my wife and i were both watching at the time and we were amazed. there were no clouds in the sky for the light to hide behind. helicopters do not turn off their lights during flight. the whole time the light did not move from the position it was in. when the light disappeared, i told my wife to check the time because i want to report this as a ufo, because we couldnt explain what it could be. we didnt bother to try to take photos or video because we see lights in the sky all the time. we watch the sky regularly. we have a telescope, binoculars, cameras, tripods, and we are fairly familiar with stars and planets. we often see airplanes fly around in the sky. once in a while we see a helicopter fly by. ive even seen a satellite move straight and smooth along the sky. this light was like a bright star or a motionless helicopter, up until the point when the light went out. from there, i have no idea what it could be.
content.summary: Bright as a car headlight. brighter than a star. look like a star or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 1528 hours friday, 28 january 2011 looking due south, i was watching an f-16 on approach to the jrb.  i noticed a very unusual object due east and at a higher elevation of the airplane.

the object appeared as two translucent balls attached with a short rod.  by appearance, it was like two silver-colored soap bubbles.  each sphere had a light that appeared to change colors, finally appearing about the color and intensity of aircraft landing lights.  the object appeared stationary at the time.

at first glance, the object had a milky translucent, almost silver appearance.  the lights seem to move from right to left, constantly changing colors.  i observed several colors.  greens and reds made the most impression.  the object then appeared a more solid silver color, like mylar, and that is when the bright white lights appeared. 

if there was any noise associated with the object, it was masked by the jet noise.

i didn���t notice any evident interaction between the object and the jet.

the whole observation lasted approximately 5-6 seconds.

i grabbed my camera and ran outside to take a picture.  as the camera booted up and the f-16 passed overhead, i looked up to aim the camera.  i could not see the object any more.

i kept monitoring the sky in all directions to see if i could see anything.  after about five minutes of not seeing the object again, i gave up and went back inside.

from my observation point, i could deduce that the object was probably at an altitude of 1500-2000 ft. over the benbrook lake.

the object end to end, appeared about as large as the fighter.  assuming it was about the same distance away as the jet was to me, i would guess each sphere must have been about 15 feet in diameter.
content.summary: Spheres over benbrook lake

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north from walkerton ontario towards chesley on cr19. looked to the west and seen a bright white star-like object pulsating with 3 smaller objects directly underneath it. the middle object was red. to the north of the object was a triangle of lights and the one corner pulsated approximately every 10 seconds. there also was another object pulsating close to the triangle formation.
after watching it for 5 minutes, the object with the 3 smaller objects underneath it moved left, then move right very slowly.
content.summary: Over paisley ontario bright white star-like object with 3 starlike objects underneath them  the middle one was was red.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my apartment on white bridge road in nashville the summer of 2005.
i had stepped out on my porch to get some air when i spotted this round, glowing object in the westerly sky.  
it would have been difficult to miss as it was obviously not a star but was large enough to catch my eye. i tried to eliminate as many possibilities as i could.  it was not moving (at least perceptibly) so it couldn't have been an aircraft.  it glowed as if it were lit internally.  unfortunately my telephoto shots were initially pretty shakey but i eventually found something to support my arm on.
i kept zooming in and out to give an idea of it's size placement in the sky in relation to my immediate surroundings.  at one point the object appears to move enough to slowly pass behind some utility lines supplying our apartments.
in the final frames of the video i zoom in on the object and it appears to be "dazzling" or brilliantly flashing.
during this time i had no emotional reaction other than "holy ****, what the hell is that?"
for some reason i just abruptly stopped taping and went back inside so i never saw it depart.  when i went out later it was gone.

i will attempt to upload a copy of my video.  if this does not work just contact me by email and tell me where i can send a copy
content.summary: A round glowing object viewed from my apartment porch.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking from a dinner.It was about 8.40 pm  i saw some kids jumping up and down pointing in the sky. i looked up and saw about 8 or 9 big glowing orange globes all connected by the structure that was mostly covered by the clouds it was aprox 1500 ft in the sky heading north.It was huge about the size of a football field. no sound smells or temp change. there were quite a few people out in their yards looking at it. a man told me that there was another one that showed up about 20 min before so im guessing there was 2 i could not get a  picture of it as i did not have anything at the time to record the event. 

 to day i saw on youtube that the iss tracked something leaving the atmosphere around 1am my time zone. please let me know what can be done to confirm this event. thanks for your time -[name of witness deleted -cms/dr]-
content.summary: I looked up and saw about 8 or 9 big glowing orange globes all connected by the structure that was mostly coverd by the clouds

content.detailedDescription: It was in the fall of 1979. my mother and i during this time were living with my grandfather. my mother was attending her buddist meeting while my grandfather watched me until she came home. during this time period,i was nine years old, i was in the fourth grade and was in a private school. on the night of the event, i had been home from school for about two hours. i hadn't changed out of my uniform. i was working on my math homework. as i was trying to work out a math problem in my head, i had looked up at a raw, white, crystal quartz that was on top of the fireplace mantle. i then turned my head to the right to look out of the french doors located behind me. i saw hugh blinking lights flying slantedly over the hillside heading towards my house. my first thought was that maybe it was an airplane that was about to crash. i immediately put down my math book, paper and pencil, and stood up and walked over to the french doors, that lead to the side of the house, which over looked the city. my grandfather was in the kitchen at this time washing the dishes. i quickly walked past him without saying a word and made my way outside to the driveway. once out side it was as though time seemed to slow down and everything seemed to move in slow motion. the craft was slowly gliding while at the same time it was spinning in a circular motion. i yelled to my grandfather, "granddad, come out here quick!" "there is something flying in the sky!" my grandfather quickly came out to investigate. he looked up at the craft. the craft was as high up in the sky a helicopter. my grandfather said to me, "it could be an airplane", i said, "no, airplanes don't hover." he then said, "maybe it's a helicopter." i said, "no, helicopters have four windows, two in the front and one on each side of it." this craft has at least 24 light blinking on and off and it has a hugh red glowing ball on top of it and it looks like the ball is floating above it." i said, "helicopters don't look like that and besides, helicopters and airplanes make a noise. he said, "maybe it is the goodyear blimp." i said, with little frustration,"granddad, it is not the goodyear blimp, because even the goodyear blimp has a humming sound to it." i said, whatever it is this thing has no sound to it at all." my grandfather said, "stay here i am going to get a flash light." i stayed outside watching this craft still gliding and at the same time spinning in a circular motion and what it had appeared to still be approaching our house. like i said before, everything seem to be going in slow motion. my grandfather came back with his flash light and flicked the flash light on and off several times. when he did this, the craft suddenly stopped gliding and was now hovering almost over our house. i felt my heart racing, because i didn't know what was going to come next. the craft continued to hover for approximately ten minutes before it started gliding back to in the same direction from which it came. i ran back into the house to where the french doors were, just to see it glide back over the hillside. once it was gone out of sight, my grandfather and i resumed back to what we were doing, never discussing any further what we had saw. when my mother came home, my grandfather and i told her that we saw a craft in the sky that was not a helicopter, airplane or the goodyear blimp. that waa all we said to her and did not discuss the matter anymore. she told me later that night that it would be best to not tell everyone what i thought to be a ufo, because not everyone understands that. through the years i drew pictures of the craft that i had saw that night in 1979. i sketched one recently free hand style the way in which i saw the craft that night. unfortunately, i am having trouble uploading the sketch of the craft to my e-mail to then transfer to this web site.
content.summary: Circled disc with light in between with a hugh red pulsating sphere in top.

content.detailedDescription: I just went outside to have a cigarette looked up and saw a jet ( passenger) looked down for litterally 2 seconds at the most, looked up and jet was gone, still heard noise but it was gone. it was quit low and at the altitude it was at and the very clear sky there no way it went out of my sight that fast, it was to low to dissapear that fast. by the way the sky was full of contrails that hung around for hours. not saying it was a ufo in disguise but vanished way to fast...
content.summary: Dissapearing plane

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at a house on google earth and came across this picture, seemed like its worth taking a look at???
content.summary: Strange light

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were out in our back yard looking for one of our cats and i asked him what is that i thought it was a flare gun. it was an orange glow round circle, it scared us at first but i said it must be an ufo! i really think it was! but it just started moving and we watched the 2 move through the sky slow at first and then they started a little faster and then the second one just went away and i asked my husand were did that one go and then the first one faded away too. this is our first time ever seeing anything like this, very interesting! can you please give me any info of what we saw? i do belive anything is possible!  thanks, *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: 2 fireball orange cicrles in air

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car reading a book, when i noticed a green flash of light. i looked up and saw what looked like a giant gray orb floating in the sky, and it just kept rotating around and around. i got out of the car to get a closer look as i was curious about what it was and when i realized what it was i jumped back inside my car for my camera, but as soon as i got my camera out of the car it flashed blue for a second and zoomed away but i was able to take a picture of it before it disappeared entirely.
content.summary: It looked like a giant grey orb floating in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Star like object aprox 205 degrees and 35 degress above horizon, at first looks like planet or bright star but after short time can see object move around, some up/down then orbital movement, some change in light intensity and color, observed in the exact same place two nights in a row at same time, last about two hours then gone both nights.

first night i talked myself into optical illusion or tempurater inversion, however second night (28th) i took more time and changed my line of sight to object and my elivation in rtelation to object by going up incline about 1000 ft. no change in apperance of light or erratic movement??

i am not leanning to any conclusions as of yet and expect a duh moment at any time ( i hope not) i do have a proffessional background in areas that should lean to my knowing wtfudge this is. just wondering if you guys have a simple answer. i feel strange not knowing what it is i am looking at.

thanks i am a huge fan of your work
content.summary: Bob and latteral movement

content.detailedDescription: My story is a long one. so i will only tell you this part. i have a message for the humans of this planet. the beings that i have talked to have conveyed to me that our time is at hand. your conflicts with the planet can no longer be tolerated. they have already begun to make the changes neccessary to introduce several new species that will be more in balance with this planet. those of you whose d.N.A. have been collected  and accepted, will be allowed to continue to exist as long as you find balance with your needs and the needs of this planet. i was asked if i would like to travel with them. as crazy as that may sound and as hard as it is to say, it ist true. after initially stating that i would, i grew scared and thought about all that could happen to me and recanted. i then realized that what i was being asked was if i wanted to survive beyond the point of mankinds dimise. i had no such desire. i decided to stay because i believe that we as a species can do better. i realize that we are slow to learn, but those of us who will survive the correction will be able to change. i believe that we are already starting to do just that. the craft that i saw that night was one of many that i have seen over the course of three years. i do have the photos and videos of a number of them but i will no longer submit them for the sake of what appears to be entertainment value. befor making this decision i did however post two videos on you tube to give credence to my statments. they are posted under *(youtube information moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) that is however not the only proof i can provide. i will submit any and all videos i have to anyone who is seriously willing to investigate this issue. i cannot say this with enough importantance. take what i have said seriously. do what you can to change you lives. to love every sacred thing on this planet and realize that the needs of the many  do outweigh the needs of the few! i don't know if we even have enough time to try to make the correction, but i hope with all of my being that we do! although these beings are not gods, or have not revealed themselvs as such, they do however seem to be responsible for this planet and will remove whatever threats present themselves. i do not speak for them, but they do speak through me and by numerous others they have contacted. the people that they have given this message to are young and old, rich and poor, all races and nationalities. some or which are afraid to come forward because of the stigma associated with this subject. i was one of those people. but i am no longer. if a little embarrassment will help to save a species (our species) then so be it. you can choose to not take this seriously, or you can choose to change your fate.  they will be waiting for your answers.
content.summary: Illuminated object being guarded by at least 14 unknown cyclinder  and different colored objects

content.detailedDescription:
While coming and going from my home i see this from my driveway.

almost every night but not every night i am seeing a bright light like a bright star to the north by north east of boise
that changes colors from red to green and white and blue. it rotates in the sky like as if it was a star meaning it seems to stay in formation
of the natural star rotation. i see it very well on clear nights and often and best around 7 to 8:30. you can see it is brighter than most stars and 
when looked at with binoculars, it for sure changes colors. i do not understand that it is not there every night and 
this last week it moved a bit to a more north location. i have observed this over the last several weeks. gotta be some logical answer, right?
at least this is what i am thinking. 

at first i thought it may be a stationary satelite or space station
but it is not there every night. it will be there 3 or 4 nights and then be gone a few and then back but in a different location and with in 30 degrees or so of original sighting. 

i watch it for a few minutes and check back on it every 30 min. or so. 
sometiomes it is gone and some times it is there until late when i go to bed.  


what might you know about this. 

i am sorry no photos, it is distant and really not to much exciting to look at.
content.summary: Brighter than stars, flashing green, white,red, moves with stars. not there everynight. east of boise

content.detailedDescription: "last night around 10pm my boyfriend came to pick me up from my parents house in brandon, fl. as we wer...E driving away i noticed a red pulsing light in the sky behind the tree line, i didnt think much of it because it was probably just a radio tower. as we made it past the tree line i noticed that is was not only one red pulsing light but two red pulsing lights accompanied by a green light that pulsed between the pauses of red. it was moving rather quickly across the sky in a sweeping motion covering about a 2-3 mile distance every time it changed direction. i was ecstatic and made my boyfriend turn the car around to go back as i didn't want to loose sight of it. he made a u-turn and pulled into a gas station parking lot and i jumped out of the car. it was very low in the sky and passed directy over my head. it looked to me like it was blimp shaped, def. was not a airplane or a chopper as i would have been able to discern at that distance. it was accompanied by noise, kind of like and airplane would make but not as loud as i think it should of been given the close proximity to me. my boyfriend saw it, he did not think it was unusual and told me it was probly just a blimp. i did not know blimps could move that quickly or fly that low. as soon as it passed me overhead we got back into the car to continue our trip across the bridge to st petersburg, florida. as we are driving on i-75 my eyes are to the sky, still stunned by what i had just seen when i noticed in the distance a strobing white light. now i grew up on airforce bases and know what the lights on a plane look like, this was not the case. this light was flashing continuously fast. i kept my eyes on it and was excitedly telling my boyfriend what i was seeing he didnt see it because he didn't want to take his eyes off the road. it started getting closer and closer to us travelling perpendicular to our car. i rolled down my window to see if i could hear anything or get a closer look, i did not hear any noise coming from it but did happen to catch what looked like a dark triangular shadow beneath the light. it passed over top of the car and i lost sight of it. it reappeared on the driver side yet this time it was a steady red ball of light; my boyfriend saw this. i remember feeling an overwhelming sense of happiness and love. i was not scared just very excited!
content.summary: Witnessed two sperate ufo. one being blimp(?) shaped with red and green pulsing lights and the other being triangle(?) shaped with white strobe that turned into steady red light.

content.detailedDescription: 1 .On holiday on the isle of wight uk . august 20th 2009. i was taking digital photos of a perfect sunset over the solent towards southampton/portsmouth. 2. the what i can describe , metallic ball object was only noticed by me at my holiday home thorness bay isle of wight the same evening as i transfered the pictures from my digital camera to my laptop. i noticed the strange object straight away , however had not seen it with my naked eye at the time the picture was taken.3. at first my family who were with me said it was proberbly a  hot air balloon, but i personally had to dismiss this because surely there would have been the shape of the basket below it.Perhaps it is something to do with the suns rays in the photo? but ive seen many other photos of similar objects on the internet and on you tube sightings. 4 . a ball shaped metallic object .No witness of its motions due to it only behing descovered when veiwed on my laptop pc.5.I have very strongs feelings about any unexplained sighting of anything ufo related or supernatural . i think the fact of not having a rational explination of what is seen with the human eye feels me with facination and curiosity. i have kept this picture close to my personal feelings since my holiday in august 2009 and only my children , parents , and partner have seen this photo and i seem to be the only person who has strong feelings towards this subject. i now have for some reason  a strong facination for the unexplained and or especially ufo sightings.6. only noticed when photo was first veiwed, therefore can not answer point 6.
content.summary: Sighted only on upload of holiday pictures taken from my digital camera

content.detailedDescription: On the night of dec-9-2010 at around 10 pm i was driving a buddy home and as soon as i pulled out of my drive way i first looked up and saw two white balls of light flying in the sky like if ther were fire flies. i immedietly told my friend to look and he also saw the manuverous the lights were making. the night was clear so we decided to try and chase the lights , well as were were following the lights we noticed that one of the other lights dimmed out and it was just one light flying crazy doing circles and just freeflying like a freewriter writting lines on a paper. then all of a sudden the second light came back but the other light flew out from the single light!!!!! after that we knew that this light we were seeing was not normal or neither an airplane at all. we followed until the lights chose to fly north east towards alice tx at a low altitudue but an escessive speed that we could not even get to the other side of town to try and follow. i had planned to report this sighting asap however my family did not have the internet so i am now making my report. i hope we get more reports in this county because there are alot of strange lights that appear however it is such a small town that no one bothers to notice these lights
content.summary: While taking a friend home we witnessed two strange lights flying in the sky like fire flies,

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside about ten minutes to seven, and observed a bright ball of light coming from the western sky towards my house.  very low flying, quiet with no noise, i grabbed my video camera.  i taped it first from the west, from the back of my house and followed the ball to the east side of my house.  it was moving very slow to the east for  seven to ten minutes, heading towards boise from caldwell, idaho.
content.summary: Bright ball of light coming west to east

content.detailedDescription:
Yes..!I have seen the light orbs in my back yard sky and in some photos they are not seen with the naked eye...! i even found a beamship way out in inerspace and other craft. view the photos let me know what you see...After you blow them up..(o: 

i was praying because of the ufo experience i've had on the 1-17-11
i heard a voice in my head say 
we will reviel ourselves to you tommorow 12 o'clock 
i was late being 1:30 but when i went outside in my yard i looked up at 12:00 and there i saw a bright light orb twinkeling and moving slow
3 or 4 miles an hour it was hovering and moving slow in a long horse shoe form for about ten minutes looked liked a snow ball adgitating and twinkeling i felt releived and calm because i know in my heart that i had prayed for the truth and that they would show up and they did.
i can't ay they will show up every time i pray god knows when. i am jut earching for the truth in this matter of fact they do exsist.
after blowing the pictures up i found more crafts i have photos 
and a video that was interferd with while filming and i was not facing the sun.
content.summary: Bright white light orb spotted in my backyard sky...2011
